author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-5280. Adds a check to prevent a task state transition from FAILED to any of UNASSIGNED, RUNNING, COMMIT_PENDING or SUCCEEDED. Contributed by Devaraj Das.

author: ddas
msg: Merge -r 746967:746968 from trunk onto 0.20 branch. Fixes HADOOP-4744.

author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-4744. Workaround for jetty6 returning -1 when getLocalPort is invoked on the connector. The workaround patch takes the most conservative approach of killing the server process whenever this is true. Contributed by Devaraj Das.

author: ffang
msg: [SMXCOMP-462]change osgi spring file for servicemix-camel according to the recent servicemix-camel refactor(SMXCOMP-455Create JbiComponent per SU (camel context))

author: ngn
msg: Set socket timeout for FTP client
